definition: surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: It is, in fact, great good fortune.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，那是天大的福分。

sentences.english: Now, at this time to overcome it, you have to count your blessings.
sentences.chinese: 现在为了超越这种状况，你必须数算一下你的福分。

sentences.english: Reclaim Nature's Blessings, Through BN's Products.
sentences.chinese: 盼藉著拜恩的产品，重享大自然的福分。

sentences.english: And he said, Thy brother came with subtilty, and hath taken away thy blessing.
sentences.chinese: 以撒说，你兄弟已经用诡计来将你的福分夺去了。

sentences.english: Sometimes blessings come in the form of problems.
sentences.chinese: 有时，福分是以困境的形式来到的。

sentences.english: Mary, says Jesus, is doing what is better.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣表示，马利亚所作的，才是上好的福分。

sentences.english: Let’s think about what God has blessed us with.
sentences.chinese: 让我们多想想上帝赐予我们的福分。

definition: to live comfortably/happy and prosperous life
to accumulate merit/to do good/to give to charity/virtuous actions
favor/to give charity to sb out of pity
the blessing of three lifetimes (idiom)/(courteous language) it's my good fortune...
